roleset.name: come to/point to a decision based on evidence

example.name: conclude-v: icky
example.text: An undistinguished college student who dabbled in zoology until he concluded that he could n't stand cutting up frogs , Mr. Corry wanted to work for a big company `` that could do big things . ''

propbank.arg: that he could n't stand cutting up frogs

example.name: conclusion-n: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The most important one was her conclusion that radioactivity is an " atomic " phenomenon , not something caused by the molecular structure of the mineral .

propbank.arg: that radioactivity is an " atomic " phenomenon , not something caused by the molecular structure of the mineral

example.name: conclusion-n: Args 0 & 1
example.text: In particular , their conclusion that support for language rights among anglophones is unrelated to a general commitment to civil rights is surprising .

propbank.arg: that support for language rights among anglophones is unrelated to a general commitment to civil rights

example.name: conclusion-n: arg2
example.text: Lee added that he hoped the Advisory Group would shortly come to a firm conclusion on the " one China " issue .

example.name: conclusive-j: arg3
example.text: I would n't support it for first time offenses , but when a criminal is given a second chance and reoffends , I 'm all for it ... I mean , if the evidence is 100 % conclusive that is , which is the case most of the time now with modern technology etc

propbank.arg: which is the case most of the time now with modern technology etc

example.name: conclusive-j: args 1, 3
example.text: acid test - A test that is conclusive of the value or success of something , derived from the original use of nitric acid as a test for gold .

propbank.arg: of the value or success of something

example.name: conclusive-j: args 0, 2, 3
example.text: The evidence was conclusive for the court on the issue of paternity

example.name: conclusive-j: args 1, 3
example.text: The test was conclusive of paternity

roleset.note: CONCLUDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'conclude' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'decide'. Member of VNcls deduce-97.2. (from conclude.01-v)
CONCLUSION-N NOTES: Roleset basedon verb entry conclude.01, OntoNotes grouping conclusion-n sense 2;maps to VN class deduce-97.2. Framed by Claire. (from conclusion.01-n)
CONCLUSIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from conclusive.01-j)
Arg2 new to the adjective frame, but can occur in the verb as well. It is vital to this adjectival use. (from conclusive.01-j)

roleset.name: bring to an end

example.name: only transitive
example.text: Mr. Nichol said he was `` extremely disappointed in the continuing deterioration of the company 's operations while it attempted to conclude the reorganization during the past four months . ''

example.name: ARG2 and ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Lebanon , Iraq and other hot issues were for the most part the gist of the call with which the Gulf leaders concluded their 27th summit in Riyadh .

example.name: action as thing concluded
example.text: A long - time Tri - State area radio personality , in October 2009 he concluded doing a regular morning program on " Oldies 1160 " .

propbank.arg: A long - time Tri - State area radio personality
doing a regular morning program on " Oldies 1160 "

example.name: ergative
example.text: In this jeremiad , males are viewed as the " enemy , " and are so characterized throughout the book , which concludes with exhortations to engage the foe and a strident call to arms - LRB- though not men 's -RRB- .

propbank.arg: with exhortations to engage the foe and a strident call to arms - LRB- though not men 's -RRB-

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Much of Europe lay in ruins at the conclusion of World War II .

example.name: Args 0, 1, MNR
example.text: Her hasty conclusion of the board meeting was meant to avert a fight between two of the board members .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Thomas began covering the White House with the Kennedy Administration in 1961 , becoming known for her front - row seat at presidential news conference and her conclusion of conferences with the tagline " Thank you , Mr. President . "

propbank.arg: with the tagline " Thank you , Mr. President . "

roleset.note: CONCLUDE-V NOTES: Comparison with 'end'. Member of VNcls stop-55.4-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from conclude.02-v)
